name: Photography Package
description: Capture your special day with our professional photography package. High-quality photos that will preserve your wedding memories.
detailed_description: Our photography package includes a full day of coverage, professional photographers, edited high-resolution photos, and an online gallery for easy sharing with family and friends.

name: Floral Arrangements
description: Enhance your wedding's beauty with stunning floral arrangements. Customized bouquets, centerpieces, and more.
detailed_description: Our floral arrangements are handcrafted to match your wedding theme and colors. We offer a wide variety of flower choices and can create beautiful bouquets, centerpieces, and floral decorations.

name: Catering Services
description: Delight your guests with a delectable feast. Our catering services offer a range of delicious cuisines to suit your taste.
detailed_description: Our catering services provide a culinary experience that will impress your guests. We offer a diverse menu with options for various dietary preferences and can accommodate both small and large weddings.

name: Venue Rental
description: Host your wedding in a picturesque venue. Our rental includes a beautiful setting for your special day.
detailed_description: Our venue rental includes a stunning location with indoor and outdoor options. We provide all the necessary amenities and a beautiful backdrop for your wedding ceremony and reception.

name: DJ and Entertainment
description: Keep the party going with our professional DJ and entertainment services. Dance the night away with your loved ones.
detailed_description: Our DJ and entertainment services include a playlist tailored to your music preferences, professional sound equipment, lighting, and entertainment options to keep your guests dancing and having a great time.

name: Wedding Planning
description: Let us take care of the details. Our wedding planning services ensure a stress-free and memorable event.
detailed_description: Our wedding planning services cover everything from venue selection and d√©cor planning to timeline coordination and vendor management. We work closely with you to bring your vision to life and create a seamless and memorable wedding day.
